languages.text: {n}Массивный мужчина в униформе офицера губернаторской стражи напряженно наблюдает за подчиненными, окружившими здание. Почувствовав ваше приближение, он резко оборачивается, бледнеет и низко кланяется.{/n} "Ваша Светлость! Прошу, не подходите к дому слишком близко. Там укрылся один из террористов, участвовавших в сегодняшнем нападении. Он может быть опасен".

traits.locale_text: {n}Массивный мужчина в униформе офицера губернаторской стражи напряженно наблюдает за подчиненными, окружившими здание. Почувствовав ваше приближение, он резко оборачивается, бледнеет и низко кланяется.{/n} "Ваше Благородие! Прошу, не подходите к дому слишком близко. Там укрылся один из террористов, участвовавших в сегодняшнем нападении. Он может быть опасен".

languages.text: {n}A hulking man dressed in a uniform marking him out as an officer of the gubernatorial wardens is closely monitoring his subordinates as they surround the building. Sensing your approach, he whips around, his face going pale, and he offers a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please, do not stray too close to the building. One of the terrorists from today's attack has holed himself up in there. He could be dangerous."
languages.original_text: {n}Массивный мужчина в униформе офицера губернаторской стражи напряженно наблюдает за подчиненными, окружившими здание. Почувствовав ваше приближение, он резко оборачивается, бледнеет и низко кланяется.{/n} "Ваша Светлость! Прошу, не подходите к дому слишком близко. Там укрылся один из террористов, участвовавших в сегодняшнем нападении. Он может быть опасен".

Sensing your approach, he whips around, his face going pale, and he offers a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please, do not stray too close to the building. One of the terrorists from today's attack has holed himself up in there. He could be dangerous."

languages.text: {n}総督直属ワーデンの将校であることを示す制服に身を包んだ、図体の大きな男は、建物を取り囲む部下を厳重に監督している。近づくこちらの気配を感じて振り向いたその顔は青白くなり、深いお辞儀をして見せる。{/n}「陛下！この建物には近づきすぎないようお願いいたします。今日の襲撃を実行したテロリストの一人が立てこもっています。危険が及ぶかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking man dressed in a uniform marking him out as an officer of the gubernatorial wardens is closely monitoring his subordinates as they surround the building. Sensing your approach, he whips around, his face going pale, and he offers a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please, do not stray too close to the building. One of the terrorists from today's attack has holed himself up in there. He could be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督直属ワーデンの将校であることを示す制服に身を包んだ、図体の大きな男は、建物を取り囲む部下を厳重に監督している。近づくこちらの気配を感じて振り向いたその顔は青白くなり、深いお辞儀をして見せる。{/n}「陛下！この建物には近づきすぎないようお願いいたします。今日の襲撃を実行したテロリストの一人が立てこもっています。危険が及ぶかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}一个身材魁梧的男子穿着军官制服，正仔细监督者他的手下保卫这座建筑。他察觉到你走了过来，立刻转过了身。随后，他的脸色变得煞白，深鞠一躬。{/n}“大人！请不要离这座建筑太近。今天的袭击事件中，其中一名恐怖分子依然藏在这里，他可能会很危险。”
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking man dressed in a uniform marking him out as an officer of the gubernatorial wardens is closely monitoring his subordinates as they surround the building. Sensing your approach, he whips around, his face going pale, and he offers a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please, do not stray too close to the building. One of the terrorists from today's attack has holed himself up in there. He could be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}一个身材魁梧的男子穿着军官制服，正仔细监督者他的手下包围这座建筑。他察觉到你走了过来，立刻转过了身。随后，他的脸色变得煞白，深鞠一躬。{/n}“大人！请不要离这座建筑太近。今天的袭击事件中，其中一名恐怖分子依然藏在这里，他可能会很危险。”

languages.text: {n}Un hombre corpulento, ataviado con un uniforme que lo identifica como oficial de la guardia gubernamental, vigila de cerca a sus subordinados mientras estos rodean el edificio. Al sentir tu presencia, se da la vuelta, su rostro palidece y hace una reverencia.{/n} «¡{mf|Milord|Milady}! No se acerque mucho al edificio. Uno de los terroristas del atentado de hoy se ha atrincherado dentro. Podría ser peligroso».
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking man dressed in a uniform marking him out as an officer of the gubernatorial wardens is closely monitoring his subordinates as they surround the building. Sensing your approach, he whips around, his face going pale, and he offers a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please, do not stray too close to the building. One of the terrorists from today's attack has holed himself up in there. He could be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre corpulento, ataviado con un uniforme que lo identifica como oficial de la guardia gubernamental, vigila de cerca a sus subordinados mientras estos rodean el edificio. Al sentir tu presencia, se da la vuelta, su rostro palidece y hace una reverencia.{/n} «¡{mf|Milord|Milady}! No se acerque mucho al edificio. Uno de los terroristas del atentado de hoy se ha atrincherado dentro. Podría ser peligroso».

languages.text: {n}Ein bulliger Mann in Uniform, die ihn als Offizier der Wächter der Gouverneurin identifiziert, beobachtet aufmerksam seine Untergebenen, wie sie das Gebäude umstellen. Er nimmt dich wahr, fährt herum, erblasst und verbeugt sich tief.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Haltet bitte Abstand von dem Gebäude. Einer der Terroristen von dem Anschlag heute hat sich da drin verschanzt. Er könnte gefährlich sein."
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking man dressed in a uniform marking him out as an officer of the gubernatorial wardens is closely monitoring his subordinates as they surround the building. Sensing your approach, he whips around, his face going pale, and he offers a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please, do not stray too close to the building. One of the terrorists from today's attack has holed himself up in there. He could be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein bulliger Mann in Uniform, die ihn als Offizier der Wächter der Gouverneurin identifiziert, beobachtet aufmerksam seine Untergebenen, wie sie das Gebäude umstellen. Er nimmt dich wahr, fährt herum, erblasst und verbeugt sich tief.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Haltet bitte Abstand von dem Gebäude. Einer der Terroristen von dem Anschlag heute hat sich da drin verschanzt. Er könnte gefährlich sein."

languages.text: {n}Un homme imposant, vêtu d'un uniforme le désignant comme un officier des gardiens de la gouverneure, surveille de près ses hommes en train d'encercler le bâtiment Vous sentant approcher, il se retourne, le visage soudain pâle, et s'incline devant vous.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Je vous demanderai de ne pas vous approcher trop près du bâtiment. L'un des terroristes de l'attaque d'aujourd'hui s'y est réfugié et il pourrait s'avérer dangereux. »
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking man dressed in a uniform marking him out as an officer of the gubernatorial wardens is closely monitoring his subordinates as they surround the building. Sensing your approach, he whips around, his face going pale, and he offers a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please, do not stray too close to the building. One of the terrorists from today's attack has holed himself up in there. He could be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme imposant, vêtu d'un uniforme le désignant comme un officier des gardiens de la gouverneure, surveille de près ses hommes en train d'encercler le bâtiment Vous sentant approcher, il se retourne, le visage soudain pâle, et s'incline devant vous.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Je vous demanderai de ne pas vous approcher trop près du bâtiment. L'un des terroristes de l'attaque d'aujourd'hui s'y est réfugié et il pourrait s'avérer dangereux. »

languages.text: {n}Üniforması valinin dizdarlarının subayı olduğunu işaret eden devasa bir adam, binanın çevresini saran askerlerini yakından gözlemliyor. Yaklaştığını sezince aniden dönüyor, yüzü soluklaşıyor ve yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Lütfen binaya fazla yaklaşmayın. Bugünkü saldırıdan sorumlu teröristlerden biri kendisini içeri kapattı. Tehlikeli olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking man dressed in a uniform marking him out as an officer of the gubernatorial wardens is closely monitoring his subordinates as they surround the building. traits.locale_text: {n}Üniforması yönetici muhafız subayı olduğuna işaret eden devasa bir adam, binanın çevresini saran askerlerini yakından gözlemliyor. Yaklaştığını sezince aniden dönüyor, yüzü soluklaşıyor ve yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Lütfen binaya fazla yaklaşmayın. Bugünkü saldırıdan sorumlu teröristlerden biri kendisini içeri kapattı. Tehlikeli olabilir."
